DataElement.preferredName: Radiation Boost Extramedullary Anatomic Site Administered Other Specify Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A free-text field to describe another site for the extramedullary radiation boost.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Radiation Boost Extramedullary Anatomic Site Administered
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: One or more extra radiation treatments targeted at the tumor bed, given after the regular sessions of radiation are complete._Outside of, or unrelated to, any medulla, especially the medulla oblongata._Named locations of or within the body._The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test).

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: One or more extra radiation treatments targeted at the tumor bed, given after the regular sessions of radiation are complete.

Concepts.definition: One or more extra radiation treatments targeted at the tumor bed, given after the regular sessions of radiation are complete.

Property.preferredDefinition: Outside of, or unrelated to, any medulla, especially the medulla oblongata.:Named locations of or within the body.:The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test).

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

DataElementConcept.origin: COG CRF:Children's Oncology Group Case Report Form

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The free text field that describes another response when other is chosen from a list of values.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Not otherwise specified.:Specify; be specific about something; define clearly.:Text; the words of something written.

Concepts.definition: Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.
Be specific about something; define clearly.
